articles.title: Measles rises globally amid vaccination crash; WHO and CDC sound the alarm - Ars Technica
articles.description: From 2021 to 2022, measles deaths increased 43 percent.
articles.content:

articles.author: Beth Pariseau
articles.title: IT pros wary as Microsoft Copilot juggernaut gains steam - TechTarget
articles.description: Microsoft is now 'The Copilot company,' along with GitHub, but concerns linger about the accuracy of AI-generated results, code lineage and long-term job security.
articles.content: Microsoft Copilot is officially the major focus of the cloud vendor's strategy going forward, but some of the end users who will be most affected by the generative AI boom remain cautious about its p… [+8369 chars]
